<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Handy with Your Paws](/Feats.aspx?ID=1216) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Shoony" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=296" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #153: Life's Long Shadows](/Sources.aspx?ID=29) pg. 72</row>

</column>

---

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4) checks to [Repair](/Actions.aspx?ID=42) non-magical items, and you don’t need a [repair kit](/Equipment.aspx?ID=43) for such repairs as long as you have any amount of junk, spare parts, or debris at your disposal.

<title level="2">Handy with Your Paws leads to...</title>
[Unrivaled Builder](/Feats.aspx?ID=1226)
name: Handy with Your Paws
